definition: and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to draw support from/with the help of

sentences.english: And that's how Allied mathletes helped win the war.
sentences.chinese: 盟军的数学梦之队就这样助他们赢得了二战胜利。

sentences.english: The leach aiding effect and action mechanism of leach aid agent citric acid are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了助浸剂柠檬酸的助浸效果及其作用机理。

sentences.english: Combat that with a small fan on your desk that will help keep air circulating in your workspace.
sentences.chinese: 要解决它可以用一个小风扇助你周围空气流通。

sentences.english: Help the champs in shooting and get the benefit with a lot of shooting, striking and fighting.
sentences.chinese: 助在拍的香榭舍大街，得到了很多拍的利益，打和力。

sentences.english: I believe my Wabisuke is the best suited with the 3rd Division way of thinking out of all the zampakutous.
sentences.chinese: 我想我的侘助使所有斩魄刀中最适合三番队的理念的。

sentences.english: Soldering flux meeting the lead-free requirements is used for the lead-containing solder paste manufactured by our company.
sentences.chinese: 本公司生产的有铅锡膏已采用符合无铅要求的助焊膏。

sentences.english: Have you had trouble with sleeping or pain pills is the past?
sentences.chinese: 过去你因为服用助眠药或止痛药有过什么不良反应吗？

sentences.english: Hair mask restor and nourish damaged hair to help create the best styling result.
sentences.chinese: 护发素高度修护受损发质，助你达致理想造型效果。

sentences.english: Here genuinely few tricks to help you hasong.
sentences.chinese: 这里有几个诀要助你前行。

sentences.english: After my third year of graduate study I became an Assistant Professor at Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 在研究生的第三年，我成为了芝加哥大学的助教授。

sentences.english: The mechanism of enzyme-aided bleaching was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 同时对木聚糖酶的助漂机理进行了总结。

sentences.english: Thin Man is not too warm dry medication, to help prevent Fire Shangyin.
sentences.chinese: 瘦人用药则不宜过分温燥，以防助火伤阴。

sentences.english: The King's daughter, Yannenga, always helped him win the battles.
sentences.chinese: 国王的女儿叶尼佳总是为父亲打胜仗助一臂之力。

sentences.english: Saudati's goal in the 55th minute was decisive.
sentences.chinese: 绍达蒂在第55分钟的进球助客队拿到关键三分。

sentences.english: It was said that the patient once asked the doctor to help him die.
sentences.chinese: 据说那个病人曾要求医生助他一死。

sentences.english: The wind will not give the ship a hand if there is not a specific destination port for its voyage.
sentences.chinese: 航行若没有确定的目的港，风决不会助他一臂之力。

definition: to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
by contrast/but as for this.../viewed from another angle/subjectively/introspection
to rely on sth (for support etc)/to depend on
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither
to arrest/to capture/to seize/to win (a set, a game etc)
